review: This product works great with the other Apple items I have in the house.  I know Chrome and Roku have similar products, and honestly, you can't go wrong with any of them.  However, if you are looking for a bunch of free stuff, then you will be disappointed.  The majority of the good things added to  Apple TV cost money to use.  But, if you have a Macbook or iPhone/iPad, then you can mirror things from your tablet or phone to the TV.  There are some free things on here like YouTube and some sports or news apps, but Netflix, Hulu Plus require a subscription and HBO to Go doesn't work with all Cable providers.
author: Veronica
